name: @glifxyz/glif-mcp-server
description: Run AI magic workflows from glif.app
author: glifxyz

scripts.release: BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current) && [ "$BRANCH" = "main" ] || (echo "Error: Must be on main branch to release" && exit 1) && VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && REPO=$(gh repo view --json nameWithOwner -q .nameWithOwner) && git tag v$VERSION && git push origin --tags && PREV_TAG=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 v$VERSION^ 2>/dev/null || echo '') && NOTES=$(git log --pretty=format:"- [%h](https://github.com/$REPO/commit/%H) %s" ${PREV_TAG:+$PREV_TAG..}HEAD) && gh release create v$VERSION --fail-on-no-commits --notes "$NOTES"
scripts.sync-versions: jq --arg v $(jq -r .version package.json) --arg pkg $(jq -r .name package.json) '.version=$v | .packages=(.packages|map(if .registry_type=="npm" and .identifier==$pkg then .version=$v else . end))' server.json > server.json.tmp && mv server.json.tmp server.json && echo 'âœ… Versions synced'
